block.p: LEAD: ''It's an amazingly resilient business. How many products can you buy for $1.20 that is an appetite suppressant, a stimulant or a relaxant, depending on the conditions - and is a legal product?'' Diana K. Temple, analyst at Salomon Brothers, on the tobacco business.
